title: Alas! And Did My Savior Bleed
author: Isaac Watts (1674-1748)

v1: Alas! and did my Savior bleed
Would He devote that sacred head
For such a worm as I?
v2: Was it for sins that I have done
v3: Well might the sun in darkness hide
When Christ, the mighty Maker died
v4: Thus might I hide my blushing face
And melt mine eyes to tears.
v5: But drops of grief can ne'er repay
The debt of love I owe:
Here, Lord, I give myself away;
